contentrichtext.text: '''McBain''' is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * [[Diane McBain]] (born 1941), American actress * [[Ed McBain]] (1926–2005), American author and screenwriter * [[Scott McBain]] (born 1960), Scottish fiction author '''Fictional characters:''' * McBain, character played by fictional actor [[List of recurring The Simpsons characters#Rainier Wolfcastle|Rainier Wolfcastle]] on ''The Simpsons'' ==See also== * [[Clan MacBain]], highland Scottish clan * [[McBain (film)|''McBain'' (film)]], 1991 action film * [[McBain, Michigan]], city in Missaukee County in the U.S. state of Michigan {{surname|McBain}}
